title: notify​
content: </> Subject:notify(...: any) → () Calls all subscribers in seperate threads with the arguments passed. The order in which each subscriber is called is undefined. subject:notify("a", 1, true)

title: subscribe​
content: </> Subject:subscribe(subscriber: (...: any) → ...any | thread) → () → () Adds a subscriber to the subject and returns a function to unsubscribe it. info The returned unsubscribe function does nothing if the subscriber is already unsubscribed. local unsubscribe = subject:subscribe(function() end) unsubscribe()
